description:
Devastated and alone, Nephy is found by the people of Kianoides and comforted by Chastille and Manuela. Just as Nephy steels her resolve and decides to return to Zagan, she`s spirited away by magic from an unknown source.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Heartbreak Can Be Literally, Physically Painful
Shitsuren to Iu no wa Butsuriteki ni mo Kekkou Itai Mono de
Un cœur brisé peut être source de douleur physique
失恋というのは物理的にもけっこう痛いもので
